import "./post.css"; import { MoreVert } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; // import { useState } from "react"; export default function Post({post}) { console.log(post) return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) }
